name: IF FOUND... SPACE MEDITATION
description:
“Every moment crushed together,
past and present and future…
Everything’s okay.”

A medititative vignette created by Valerie Dusk and commissioned by Dreamfeel.

Inspired by If Found… and a piece of original concept art by Liadh Young, join Cassiopeia as she stares towards the event horizon. The void beckons, out beyond the edge of the solar system, but this moment remains frozen, serene and beautiful.

Controls:
Left click to change views.
Escape to quit.

End note:
Heyyyy! I'm so glad Valerie was up for doing this, thank youuuu. It's really cool. If folks want to play If Found, it's available on Steam, iOS and Switch. We can't decide where it's launched so not on itch yet! :< Although we are planning on releasing the original If Found prototype up on our itch page (http://dreamfeel.itch.io) very soon for free, so I hope you dig that! 

All the best!
- Llaura
